CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( COMM_CPMSStatus__c , "New" ), "New; ", null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( COMM_CPMSStatus__c , "Reserved" ), "Reserved; ", null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( COMM_CPMSStatus__c , "Cancelled" ), "Cancelled; ", null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( COMM_CPMSStatus__c , "Error" ), "Error", null )
CustomField.label: CPMS Status
